title: Consumerist
note3: "Chris- This one is special. Hearing you speak to the genuine connection you made with this member, the emotions you felt, made me better. Your genuine passion for service and this consumer is contagious to our whole team." -Nate

title: Operationalist
note: Momentum - create and dominate. As a Nike Expert I have promoted good speed practices of advanced and expedient computer navigation and usage, and provided hard copies for the team with the current launch styles.
note2: Sustaining, takes a bit more savvy. That is where relationship building, with a personalized and expert tone comes in.

title: Strategist
note: Strategy is where there is room for 'test and learn'
note2: A specific example is my #airzoompulse strategy, where in LivePerson, I have tagged every chat with the above hashtag for easier follow ups

title: Create Future
note: Creating the future of sport, starts here with us and our business
note2: In my free time, I have been creating the future by developing a software application for Nike Experts to flex for Members; it will take in OOS styles and sizes, and will check daily which items have replenished inventory, recapturing demand

title: Offense
note: It takes a good offense to stay on top. For us offensively we have to be better than our competitors, maitain control of the conversational commerce with our members, and what I am really excited about, follow ups and clientelling
note2: Each outbound is a 'test and learn' as you are able to learn how engauged and committed the member is to our brand and service by instantly seeing whether their push notifications are enabled.

title: Win as a Team
note2: A championing culture only manifests when Results and Relationships come together at the highest level.

title: Surpirse and Delight
